mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` = 'active') AS `ACTIVEBUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `BUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY WHERE `STATUS` = 'closed' AND FIND_IN_SET (PRODUCT, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(PRODUCT) FROM ZT_PROJECTPRODUCT WHERE PROJECT= t1.`ID`))) AS `CLOSEDSTORYCNT`, t1.`DELETED`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'active') AS `FINISHBUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` IN ('done','cancel','closed')) AS `FINISHTASKCNT`, t1.`ID`, t1.`NAME`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY LEFT JOIN ZT_PROJECTSTORY ON ZT_STORY.ID = ZT_PROJECTSTORY.STORY WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `STORYCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `TASKCNT`, (SELECT SUM(CONSUMED) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `TOTALCONSUMED`, (SELECT SUM(ESTIMATE) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `TOTALESTIMATE`, (SELECT SUM(`LEFT`) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `TOTALLEFT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` <> 'closed') AS `UNCLOSEDBUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_STORY LEFT JOIN ZT_PROJECTSTORY ON ZT_STORY.ID = ZT_PROJECTSTORY.STORY WHERE `STATUS` <> 'closed' AND PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `UNCLOSEDSTORYCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_BUG WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `CONFIRMED` = 0) AS `UNCONFIRMEDBUGCNT`, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID` AND `STATUS` NOT IN ('done','cancel','closed')) AS `UNDONETASKCNT` FROM `zt_project` t1 ) t1 where id=#{id}

SELECT t1.`ID`, (SELECT SUM(CONSUMED) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t1.`ID`) AS `TIME`, 'CONSUMED' AS `TYPE` FROM `zt_project` t1 WHERE t1.`ID` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey} UNION ALL SELECT t2.`ID`, (SELECT SUM(`LEFT`) FROM ZT_TASK WHERE PROJECT = t2.`ID`) AS `TIME`, 'LEFT' AS `TYPE` FROM `zt_project` t2 WHERE t2.`ID` = #{srf.datacontext.srfparentkey}
